Class DatagramService.DatagramServiceTransmitMemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.implementations.DatagramService.DatagramServiceTransmitMemo

    @Immutable
 @ThreadSafe
public abstract static class DatagramService.DatagramServiceTransmitMemo
extends java.lang.Object
    Memo class to hold information about request while it's being processed.

      • handleSuccess

        public abstract void handleSuccess(int flags)
        Notifies that the datagram was accepted by the destination.
        Parameters:
        flags - are the 8-bit flags returned by the destination; bit 0x80 for reply pending.

      • handleFailure

        public abstract void handleFailure(int errorCode)
        Notifies that the datagram send has failed. Retryable errors are internally retried and not reported here.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the 16-bit OpenLCB error code.
